original: @192a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @192a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ka l'i yu ka pa ri ka th'a /
analyzed: ka l'i yu ka pa ri ka th'a /
translated: KƒÅlyapa·π≠ikathƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam /
translated: The Discourse on the Age of Discord

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the youthful one.

original: tshul khrims las nyams thos pa'i nor bral 'dod pas 'di nyid cung zad mchod par byed //
analyzed: tshul khrims las nyams thos pa'i nor bral 'dod pas 'di nyid cung zad mchod par byed //
translated: Degenerate in morality, bereft of the wealth of learning, people worship this very [tantra] out of desire.

original: nyes med tshul khrims ldan la yon tan ro la rgyab phyogs zhe sdang cung zad nyes pa rgod //
analyzed: nyes med tshul khrims ldan la yon tan ro la rgyab phyogs zhe sdang cung zad nyes pa rgod //
translated: Turning their backs on the taste of the qualities of those who are faultless and of good conduct, they are angry at the slightest fault.

original: rab byung rnams la khyim pas las bsgo de nas rab byung des kyang khyim pa mgu bar byed //
analyzed: rab byung rnams la khyim pas las bsgo de nas rab byung des kyang khyim pa mgu bar byed //
translated: Householders make monks do work, and then those monks please the householders.

original: ci spyad 'gro ba 'dir ni 'gro ba'i khyim du ma lus dus kyi snyigs ma zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: ci spyad 'gro ba 'dir ni 'gro ba'i khyim du ma lus dus kyi snyigs ma zhugs pa yin //
translated: Whatever is done here in this world, in the homes of beings, is all due to the influence of the degenerate age.

original: da ltar legs par spyod pa'i skye bo ngo tsha sdig pa can bsngags dga' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: da ltar legs par spyod pa'i skye bo ngo tsha sdig pa can bsngags dga' bar 'gyur //
translated: Now, people who act well are ashamed, while the sinful rejoice in praise.

original: slob dpon nor rnams mchog tu sems pas 'joms phyir slob ma rnams ni zhum par gnas //
analyzed: slob dpon nor rnams mchog tu sems pas 'joms phyir slob ma rnams ni zhum par gnas //
translated: Because the master thinks of wealth as supreme, the disciples remain discouraged.

original: 'di na byis pa'i nye du'i 'khrul 'khor gyis bcings pa ni sun 'byin byed pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'di na byis pa'i nye du'i 'khrul 'khor gyis bcings pa ni sun 'byin byed pa bzhin //
translated: Here, bound by the machine of the relatives of the childish, one is like a refutation.

original: da ltar rtsod pa'i dus na 'jig rten rnams la g-yo sgyu'i mtshon drag stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: da ltar rtsod pa'i dus na 'jig rten rnams la g-yo sgyu'i mtshon drag stobs dang ldan //
translated: In this time of strife, the world is endowed with the strong weapon of deceit.

original: bcud rnams sas 'thung dngos rnams stobs chung lha rnams char ni 'bebs mi byed //
analyzed: bcud rnams sas 'thung dngos rnams stobs chung lha rnams char ni 'bebs mi byed //
translated: The essence of the earth is drunk by the earth, things are weak, the gods do not cause rain.

original: rlung rnams rab tu drag ldang lo tog rnams ni mi smin skye mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung rnams rab tu drag ldang lo tog rnams ni mi smin skye mi 'gyur //
translated: The winds rise up very strongly, crops do not ripen and do not grow.

original: skyes la ser 'babs rnams rtsod pa'i dus kyis dbang sgyur 'bras bu med //
analyzed: skyes la ser 'babs rnams rtsod pa'i dus kyis dbang sgyur 'bras bu med //
translated: What grows is struck by hail, controlled by the time of strife, fruitless.

original: dngos rnams mthu med dgos pa sgrub rnams nyams pa thob la brtag /'gro la nad 'phel sa ni de dag skye bo rnams kyis stongs //
analyzed: dngos rnams mthu med dgos pa sgrub rnams nyams pa thob la brtag /'gro la nad 'phel sa ni de dag skye bo rnams kyis stongs //
translated: Things are powerless, goals are lost, and attainment is destroyed. Diseases increase in the world, and the earth is emptied of people.

original: ljon pa'i nags tshal @192b skom pas yal ga'i lag pa gyen du 'gred byed de //
analyzed: ljon pa'i nags tshal @192b skom pas yal ga'i lag pa gyen du 'gred byed de //
translated: The branches of the trees of the forest stretch upward with their arms of thirst.

original: rtsod pa'i dus kyis bcom byas bzang po'i dus nub ri bo tshe nges 'debs //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus kyis bcom byas bzang po'i dus nub ri bo tshe nges 'debs //
translated: The time of strife destroys, the good time sets, the mountain of life is struck.

original: yul bzang chags pa rnam spangs sa rnams su ni dus bzang yongs su zad //
analyzed: yul bzang chags pa rnam spangs sa rnams su ni dus bzang yongs su zad //
translated: In good lands, the good time is completely exhausted.

original: yon tan mkhas la mi bkur nor ldan rnams la mchod bya min par mchod //
analyzed: yon tan mkhas la mi bkur nor ldan rnams la mchod bya min par mchod //
translated: The wise are not honored, the wealthy are not worshipped.üîΩThe ignorant are worshipped. Yama leads the world to suffering. Who can stop it?

original: skye rmongs mchod byed gshin rjes 'jig rten sdug bsngal des khrid gang gis bzlog / tshul khrims 'tshal ba stobs ldan tshul khrims ldan pa bsdigs shing tshar gcod byed //
analyzed: skye rmongs mchod byed gshin rjes 'jig rten sdug bsngal des khrid gang gis bzlog / tshul khrims 'tshal ba stobs ldan tshul khrims ldan pa bsdigs shing tshar gcod byed //
translated: The powerful violate the moral conduct, and the moral are persecuted.

original: sdig pa dga' ba'i stobs ldan g-yon can rnams kyis dam chos bsnub par 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa dga' ba'i stobs ldan g-yon can rnams kyis dam chos bsnub par 'gyur //
translated: The powerful delight in evil, and the Dharma is destroyed by the deceitful.

original: gang zhig sdom pa la gnas brtan pa'i mchog la 'jug par byed pa nyung //
analyzed: gang zhig sdom pa la gnas brtan pa'i mchog la 'jug par byed pa nyung //
translated: Those who enter the supreme stability of restraint are few.

original: the tshom yod min drang srong bstan pa ring po mi thogs nub par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom yod min drang srong bstan pa ring po mi thogs nub par 'gyur //
translated: There is no doubt, the teachings of the Sage will soon disappear.

original: g-yul 'gyed rtsod pa du mas gos ltar sa g-yogs lo tog skyes la 'dod mi 'byung //
analyzed: g-yul 'gyed rtsod pa du mas gos ltar sa g-yogs lo tog skyes la 'dod mi 'byung //
translated: Like a cloth covering the battlefield, the earth will be covered with disputes. Crops will not grow, desires will not be fulfilled.

original: rlung rnams mi bzang ldang zhing de bzhin skye bo dam pa yang dag mchod mi byed //
analyzed: rlung rnams mi bzang ldang zhing de bzhin skye bo dam pa yang dag mchod mi byed //
translated: Unfavorable winds will blow, and likewise, holy beings will not be properly worshipped.

original: rgyal po dgra dang rkun ma'i 'jigs pas mi dag bag phebs nor rnams longs mi spyod //
analyzed: rgyal po dgra dang rkun ma'i 'jigs pas mi dag bag phebs nor rnams longs mi spyod //
translated: The king, in fear of enemies and robbers, does not enjoy his wealth in peace.

original: da ltar skye bo sdug bsngal bcas 'tsho 'gro ba rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung //
analyzed: da ltar skye bo sdug bsngal bcas 'tsho 'gro ba rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung //
translated: Now, people live in misery, and danger threatens all creatures.

original: gang zhig dus su char med gang du lam zhugs ser ba mi mthun du ma 'bab //
analyzed: gang zhig dus su char med gang du lam zhugs ser ba mi mthun du ma 'bab //
translated: There is no rain at the proper time; hailstorms fall in the wrong season; many are the calamities.

original: gang zhig ba rnams 'o ma mi 'byung dus rnams 'khrugs shing sa las 'bru mi skye //
analyzed: gang zhig ba rnams 'o ma mi 'byung dus rnams 'khrugs shing sa las 'bru mi skye //
translated: The cows give no milk; the seasons are disturbed; the earth yields no crops.

original: sman rnams gang yin nus med de bzhin khyad par rnams ni rab tu nyams //
analyzed: sman rnams gang yin nus med de bzhin khyad par rnams ni rab tu nyams //
translated: The herbs have lost their potency; the special qualities [of the earth] are greatly diminished.

original: yid ni nges bcom chos min rtsod pas dngos po 'di rnams nyes dang bcas ;
analyzed: yid ni nges bcom chos min rtsod pas dngos po 'di rnams nyes dang bcas ;
translated: The mind is crushed; there is no justice; the world is in turmoil; these things are corrupt.

original: / rtsod pa'i dus 'dir chos spangs mi bzad pa la yang dag zhugs pas na //üîΩgang du dbang pos char phab ljon shing yal ga dag las me tog 'bras bu cung zad snang //
analyzed: / rtsod pa'i dus 'dir chos spangs mi bzad pa la yang dag zhugs pas na // gang du dbang pos char phab ljon shing yal ga dag las me tog 'bras bu cung zad snang //
translated: In this age of strife, people are intent on the most terrible destruction of the Dharma.üîΩWhere the rain falls from the clouds, and the trees, though their branches are laden with flowers and fruit, give forth no shade,

original: sa gzhi rlan pa dang bcas sa rnams gang yin pa las lo tog smin gyur pa //
analyzed: sa gzhi rlan pa dang bcas sa rnams gang yin pa las lo tog smin gyur pa //
translated: and the earth, though moist and fertile, yields no harvest.

original: de kun tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang ngag sdom ldan chos dang ldan pa'i mthu ;
analyzed: de kun tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang ngag sdom ldan chos dang ldan pa'i mthu ;
translated: All this is due to the power of the Dharma, of the observance of morality, of the practice of austerity, and of the control of speech.

original: / dus rnams 'khrul zhing sa la bcud rnams nub 'gyur nyi zla log par rgyu //
analyzed: / dus rnams 'khrul zhing sa la bcud rnams nub 'gyur nyi zla log par rgyu //
translated: The seasons are confused, the earth is barren, the sun and moon go astray,

original: chung ma khyo la gcugs pas 'brel pa'i sems med dman pa rnams ni mthon por 'gyur //
analyzed: chung ma khyo la gcugs pas 'brel pa'i sems med dman pa rnams ni mthon por 'gyur //
translated: and the lowly rise to the highest rank, because of the love of wives for their husbands.

original: rgyal po chos spangs nor rnams mchog tu don gnyer bu rnams pha la sdang // kyi hud sdug bsngal rtsod pa'i dus ni nyer gnas bsod nams gnyer ba nags su song ;
analyzed: rgyal po chos spangs nor rnams mchog tu don gnyer bu rnams pha la sdang // kyi hud sdug bsngal rtsod pa'i dus ni nyer gnas bsod nams gnyer ba nags su song ;
translated: When the king abandons the Dharma, the sons strive for the highest wealth, and the age of sorrow and strife is at hand.

original: / chos dang rab byung dka' thub rnams 'bros bde ba rnams ni ring du song bar gyur //
analyzed: / chos dang rab byung dka' thub rnams 'bros bde ba rnams ni ring du song bar gyur //
translated: The Dharma, the religious life, and the austerities flee, and happiness is gone.

original: sa rnams 'bras bu nyung zhing rgyal po 'khrug byed mtshon gyis rgyal byed rnam par gnon //
analyzed: sa rnams 'bras bu nyung zhing rgyal po 'khrug byed mtshon gyis rgyal byed rnam par gnon //
translated: The earth yields little fruit, and the king, the agitator, is overcome by the sword.

original: 'jig rten bud med la dad bud med kyang g-yem bram ze rnams ni 'dod chen bcas //
analyzed: 'jig rten bud med la dad bud med kyang g-yem bram ze rnams ni 'dod chen bcas //
translated: The world is devoted to women, and the Brahmins are full of lust.

original: legs pa rnams nub skye ngan stobs ldan du ma rtsod pa'i dus @193a * //üîΩsu bzang po yi //
analyzed: legs pa rnams nub skye ngan stobs ldan du ma rtsod pa'i dus @193a * // su bzang po yi //
translated: The time of strife has come.

original: dus song bde ba rnams 'das dus der sbyor ba'i skyes bu rnams kyang 'das //
analyzed: dus song bde ba rnams 'das dus der sbyor ba'i skyes bu rnams kyang 'das //
translated: The time of happiness has passed. The people who practiced in that time have also passed.üîΩAnd now, at the end of this time, like a cave in darkness,

original: 'dir yang dus mtha' de rnams mun bcas phug bzhin shes ma yin //
analyzed: 'dir yang dus mtha' de rnams mun bcas phug bzhin shes ma yin //
translated: no one knows about these things.

original: legs spyad brgya phrag dri yis bsgos pa yi //
analyzed: legs spyad brgya phrag dri yis bsgos pa yi //
translated: The scent of hundreds of good practices

original: skal ldan nub cing dus ni 'das par 'gyur //
analyzed: skal ldan nub cing dus ni 'das par 'gyur //
translated: has disappeared, and the time has passed.

original: bad gzhon rtsa ba'i skud pa bzhin //
analyzed: bad gzhon rtsa ba'i skud pa bzhin //
translated: Like the thin thread of a young banana plant,

original: dkar po'i chos rnams phra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dkar po'i chos rnams phra bar 'gyur //
translated: the white Dharma has become thin.

original: blo ldan skyes bu gtam mkhas dri mas rgod //
analyzed: blo ldan skyes bu gtam mkhas dri mas rgod //
translated: The wise people who were skilled in speech have been sullied by stains.

original: 'gro 'di dga' med dgal ston zin pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro 'di dga' med dgal ston zin pa bzhin //
translated: This world is without joy, like the end of a joke.

original: bdag nyid chen po 'di ni yang dag 'gags //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po 'di ni yang dag 'gags //
translated: This great being has passed away.

original: gang na yon tan rnams kyi stobs phra la //
analyzed: gang na yon tan rnams kyi stobs phra la //
translated: Where the power of good qualities is weak,

original: yon tan la bdud 'bab pas gcod byed cing //
analyzed: yon tan la bdud 'bab pas gcod byed cing //
translated: and demons attack good qualities, cutting them down,

original: skye bo smra ba la brten 'tsho bar byed ;
analyzed: skye bo smra ba la brten 'tsho bar byed ;
translated: and people make a living by relying on speech,

original: / rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: / rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Treatise on the Topics of Debate by Master Mati≈õrƒ´ is completed.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa dzi ta shr'i bha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa dzi ta shr'i bha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Ajita≈õrƒ´bhadra and the great revisor and translator-monk ≈öƒÅkya-od.
